Escape the Nautiloid Type Quest Act Prologue Location Nautiloid Reward None

Escape the Nautiloid

Escape the Nautiloid is a Main Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Escape the Nautiloid can be acquired during the Prologue. Escape the Nautiloid tasks you with finding a way out of the Nautiloid, and finding potential Companions along the way. Completing Escape the Nautiloid will progress the story forward.

Baldur's Gate 3 Escape the Nautiloid Objectives
